title: Chat Connection
body:
Hi,

i cant connect to Chats in Client, my Friendlist seems empty, cant find other Summoner Profiles or add someone new.
Games work fine. Ques work fine.

Any got same bugs aswell?

replies.body:
Versuchs mal so:

1. Win + R
2. "services.msc" eingeben
3. "IP-Hilfsdienst" deaktivieren UND beenden
4. Client neustarten
